your prayers in your voice to your deity anywhere, anytime

Please allow the storage of files on your phone to move ahead.

The Nandi App

Nandi connects you to the divine whenever you want and from wherever you are. It offers a two-way communication between you and your beloved deities in the most respected and reputed temples, shrines and spiritual centres of the world. It sends your prayers in your voice along with your picture to your favourite temples across India and plays them there in front of the deities in a quiet manner so that your privacy and confidentiality are not breached at all. The temple sends its blessings for you and your family through audio, video and pictures in the App.

The name Nandi is inspired by the revered Nandi Bull, the guardian of Kailash Parvat and the mount of Lord Shiva, who also serves as a messenger to Shiva and it is believed that any prayer spoken in His ears reaches the Lord directly. 

Our Mission

Nandi has been imagined with the desire to bring millions of devotees closer to their faith by connecting them to their most revered places directly. We wish to bridge the gap between the devotee and the divine that gets created due to our busy lifestyles, our distances from our deities or age and inability factors. Nandi wishes to connect the devotee to their deity from anywhere in the world and anytime.

Our Team

There is a highly passionate team of young professionals working towards making Nandi successful in its mission. If you have any questions, suggestions or wish to share your Nandi story with us, we welcome you to write to us at namaskarnandi@gmail.com.
Tell us your birthday and get special offers !
